title: Low Prio Q
body:
I just got put into low prio q because the client froze when i was waiting for the game to load so i could play. After I started thinking this loading is taking a long time I alt+tab and i get a message you have been placed in low priority due to too many disconnects. This was going to be the first game of the day for me now i have do wait 20min to even get into a game because my client crashed. I have never had so many issues until patch 6.17 came out, I have been playing this game since season 3 and I am getting annoyed with the client crashing and I have put so much time and money into this game that I dont want to quit playing but if this keeps up I cant spend 6-7 hours playing to get through these queue times. Riot fix your client during the loading screens. 

LINK FOR MY GAME AFTER I WAITED THE 20min q time. THE CLIENT FROZE AGAIN!!!!
https://gyazo.com/0925120bdf535cb279c87ef5bf9b2d0c

replies.body: An account can gain a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty after a history of leaves and not just a single game.  The best way to restore your standing with the system is by playing consistently without issues.  Give me some more details about what exactly you're experiencing, and I'd be happy to help.  Let me know!
